alert.note: Alert for Bayamon; Catano; Dorado; Toa Baja; Vega Alta (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 27 at 8:32PM ADT until October 27 at 11:45PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Bayamon County in Puerto Rico... Catano County in Puerto Rico... Dorado County in Puerto Rico... Toa Baja County in Puerto Rico... Vega Alta County in Puerto Rico... * Until 1045 PM AST. * At 732 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Toa Alta, Toa Baja, Sabana Seca, Bayamon, Dorado, Vega Alta, Catano, Guaynabo, Ceiba, Candelaria, San Jose, Candelaria Arenas, Campanilla, Rio Lajas, Ingenio, Levittown, Brenas, Monserrate, Miranda and San Antonio. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Bayamon; Catano; Dorado; Toa Baja; Vega Alta
